en.title: Educational Background
en.description: A look into my academic history and accomplishments.

en.title: Bachelor's of Science in Computer Engineering
en.description: Built a strong foundation of knowledge in computer engineering, including software development, computer architecture, and digital systems design. Completed a variety of projects ranging from embedded systems and kernel development to web design and cloud computing. Minors in Computer Science, Math, Cybersecurity, and Physics.

en.title: Master of Science in Electrical and Computer Engineering
en.description: Emphases in Networks, Computer Systems and Software, and Machine Learning. Worked on a variety of projects, including AI, computer vision, and cloud computing.
